___currency.description: The currency this trustline applies to.

___frozen.description: If true, the trustline is frozen, which means that funds can only be sent to the owner.

___limit.description: The maximum amount that the owner of the trustline can be owed through the trustline.

___ripplingDisabled.description: If true, payments cannot ripple through this trustline.

___counterparty.description: The address of the account this trustline extends trust to.

___qualityIn.description: Incoming balances on this trustline are valued at this ratio.

___qualityOut.description: Outgoing balances on this trustline are valued at this ratio.

___authorized.description: If true, authorize the counterparty to hold issuances from this account.
